title: Tablecloth, "Block-printed", 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave
description: Off-white printed tablecloth. Mauve and brown flowered border print. Figures in each corner in mauve, red and brown. Red crest in center circled by various figures and flowers in mauve, red, brown and blue.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tablecloth, "Block-printed", 18th century.Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave. 1985-115-1.
